Class TestPlayerFrontend

  • java.lang.Object
    • TestPlayerFrontend

  • public class TestPlayerFrontend
extends Object
    This class tests all of the methods of PlayerFrontend

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testAddNewPlayer()
      This method tests the addition of a player via the frontend frontendDatabase
      void testChangeLevelDetails()
      This method tests whether the changeProfileDetails method successfully changes the level achieved of a player
      void testChangeProfileDetails()
      checks whether the specific profile detail has been changed after using usingChangeProfileDetails
      void testChecksecurityAnswer()
      checks whether the given security answer for a given username matches the security answer for the player in the frontendDatabase
      void testDeleteProfile()
      checks whether the deleteProfile method successfully deletes the profile
      void testLoginOperator()
      This method checks the success of the login operation for a given username and password
      void testPlayerExists()
      utilizes the username to check if the added player exists in the frontendDatabase
